title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: South Korea has decided to give up its status as a developing country at the World Trade Organization.Finance Minister Hong Nam-ki said on Friday the government made the decision given Korea's global economic status with a per capita national income of over 30-thousand U.S. dollars, and the external environment with countries like Singapore also giving up their developing country status.Korea won't be given special treatment as a WTO developing nation in future trade agreements but there won't be any changes to previously signed trade deals.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
